goals.name: Muscle Building (Hypertrophy)
goals.workout_type: Weightlifting with moderate-heavy weights, 8-12 reps, 3-4 sets per exercise

goals.name: Strength Training
goals.workout_type: Low-rep, high-weight exercises, 4-6 reps, 3-5 sets per exercise

goals.name: Fat Loss (Cutting)
goals.workout_type: Combination of cardio and strength training, higher reps (12-15), moderate weights

goals.name: Endurance Training
goals.workout_type: Long-duration, low-intensity exercises, high reps (15+), or long cardio sessions

goals.name: Functional Fitness
goals.focus: Improve movement, flexibility, and overall athleticism
goals.workout_type: Full-body workouts, bodyweight exercises, plyometrics, balance work

goals.name: Mobility and Flexibility
goals.focus: Improve range of motion and reduce injury risk
goals.schedule: 3-4 days per week (can be combined with other goals)

goals.name: Sports-Specific Training
goals.focus: Enhance performance in a particular sport
goals.workout_type: Movements that mimic the sport, agility drills, plyometrics, and strength exercises specific to the sport's needs
goals.schedule: 4-6 days per week, depending on sport and season

goals.name: Rehabilitation & Recovery
goals.focus: Recover from injury or prevent injury
goals.workout_type: Low-impact exercises, stability work, and corrective exercises
goals.schedule: 3-5 days per week, depending on injury and recovery status

goals.name: Body Recomposition
goals.focus: Lose fat while gaining muscle simultaneously
goals.workout_type: Moderate weights with medium reps (8-10), compound movements, mixed with some cardio
goals.schedule: 4-5 days per week (balanced between lifting and cardio)
